snippet: In a ceremony, Gen. Joseph F. Dunford Jr. took command from Gen. John R. Allen in managing the withdrawal of American and international troops from Afghanistan.
abstract: Gen Joseph F Dunford Jr takes command of both American and international military missions in Afghanistan in traditional handoff ceremony, becoming 15th general to lead international command there; Dunford will manage the withdrawal of nearly 100,000 troops and vast amount of equipment and cargo from the landlocked country.
lead_paragraph: In a ceremony, Gen. Joseph F. Dunford Jr. took command from Gen. John R. Allen in managing the withdrawal of American and international troops from Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Gen. Joseph F. Dunford Jr. Takes Control of Afghanistan Missions
headline.main: With New Control, General to Focus on Withdrawal in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: With New Control, General to Focus on Withdrawal in Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
